short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: G11n Previewer is an internal tool that provides machine translation and Web UI layout issue detection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Its primary goal is to provide users with valuable insights, minimizing the likelihood of encountering problems during the translation of web pages into various languages.

Key Features:
- Real-time translation of entire web pages.
- Immediate detection of UI layout issues on web pages.
